item.title: PaperMod Theme
item.description: The PaperMod theme! Installation Install as a submodule with git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod.git themes/hugo-PaperMod git submodule update --init --recursive If you liked this, consider sending a tip by ko-fi from the button below, and if you want to send me any feedback, you can reach me by email.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello world This my first post A new blog site built with Hugo. Future deploy with Netlify. The testing continues Trying to finalise git and then will set-up Netlify. Deploying with Netlify Successfully changed DNS nameservers to point to Netlify. Successfully enabled https. Netlify domain works and shows the website. BUT my domain doesn’t seem to work yet… Maybe needs more time for the nameservers to refresh on the Netlify’s part?
